GS39kamasufu:426: 2.3.12 aṅguli-saṃpuṭena piṇḍī-kṛtya nirdaśanam oṣṭha-puṭenāvapīḍayed ity avapīḍitakaṃ pañcamam api karaṇam.
GS39kamasufu:429: 2.3.15 tatra jitā sārdha-ruditaṃ karaṃ vidhunuyāt praṇuded daśet parivartayed balād āhṛtā vivadet punar apy astu paṇa iti brūyāt. tatrāpi jitā dvi-guṇam āyasyaet.
GS39kamasufu:430: 2.3.16 viśrabdhasya pramattasya vādharam avagṛhya daśanāntargatam a:
GS39kamasufu:431: nirgamaṃ kṛtvā hased utkriśet tarjayed valged āhlayet pranartitat-bhrūṇā ca vicala-nayanena mukhena vihasantītāni tāni ca brūyāt. iti cumbana-dyūta-kalahaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:433: 2.3.18 caṇḍa-vegayor eva tv eṣāṃ prayogaḥ. tat-sātmyāt.
GS39kamasufu:434: 2.3.19 tasyāṃ cumbantyām ayam apy uttaraṃ gṛhṇīyāt. ity uttara-cumbitam..2.3.20 oṣṭha-saṃdaṃśenāvagṛhyāuṣṭha-dvayam api cumbeta. iti saṃpuṭakaṃ striyāḥ puṃso vā:jāta-vyañjanasya.
GS39kamasufu:435: 2.3.21 tasminn itaro 'pi jihvayāsyā daśanān ghaṭṭayet tālu jihvāṃ ceti jihvā-yuddham.
GS39kamasufu:436: 2.3.22 etena balād vadana-radana-grahaṇaṃ dānaṃ ca vyākhyātam.
GS39kamasufu:437: 2.3.23 samaṃ pīḍitam añcitaṃ mṛdu śeṣāṅgeṣu cumbanaṃ sthāna-viśeṣa-yogāt. iti cumbana-viśeṣāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:438: 2.3.24 suptasaya mukham avalokayantyā svābhiprāyeṇa cumbanaṃ rāga-dīpanam.
GS39kamasufu:439: 2.3.25 pramattasya vivadamānasya vānyato 'bhimukhasya suptābhimukhasya vā nidrā-vyāghātārthaṃ calitakam.
GS39kamasufu:441: 2.3.27 sāpi tu bhāva-jijñāsārthinī nāyakasyāgamana-kālaṃ saṃlakṣya vyājena suptā syāt.
GS39kamasufu:442: 2.3.28 ādarśe kuḍye salile vā prayojyāyāś chāyā-cumbanam ākāra-pradarśanārtham eva kāryam.
GS39kamasufu:443: 2.3.29 bālasya citra-karmaṇaḥ pratimāyāś ca cumbanaṃ saṃkrāntakam āliṅganaṃ ca.
GS39kamasufu:444: 2.3.30 tathā niśi prekṣaṇake svajana-samāje vā samīpe gatasya prayojyāyā hastāṅguli-cumbanaṃ saṃviṣṭasya vā pādāṅguli-cumbanam.
GS39kamasufu:445: 2.3.31 saṃvāhikāyās tu nāyakam ākārayantyā nidrā-vaśād a:
GS39kamasufu:446: kāmāyā iva tasyorvor vadanasya nidhānam ūru-cumbanaṃ cety ābhiyogikāni.
GS39kamasufu:448: 2.3.32v kṛte pratikṛtaṃ kuryād tāḍite pratitāḍitam. karaṇena ca tenaiva cumbite praticumbitam..
GS39kamasufu:449: 2.3c iti śrīvātyāyanīye kāmasūtre sāṃprayogike dvitīye 'dhikaraṇe cumbana-vikalpās tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:454: 2.4.2 tasya prathama-samāgame pravāsa-pratyāgamane pravāsa-gamane kruddha-prasannāyāṃ mattāyāṃ ca prayogaḥ. na nityam a:caṇḍa-vegayoḥ.
GS39kamasufu:456: 2.4.4 tad [1] ācchuritakam [2] ardha-candro [3] maṇḍalaṃ [4] rekhā [5] vyāghra-nakhaṃ [6] mayūra-padakaṃ [7] śaśa-plutakam [8] utpala-pattrakam iti rūpato 'ṣṭa-vikalpam.
GS39kamasufu:457: 2.4.5 kakṣau stanau galaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ jaghanam ūrū ca sthānāni.
GS39kamasufu:458: 2.4.6 pravṛtta-rati-cakrāṇāṃ na sthānam a:sthānaṃ vā vidyata iti suvarṇanābhaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:459: 2.4.7 tatra savya-hastāni praty:agra-śikharāṇi dvi-tri-śikharāṇi caṇḍa-vegayor nakhāni syuḥ.
GS39kamasufu:462: vipāṭitaṃ vivardhiṣṇu mṛdu snigdha-darśanam iti nakha-guṇāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:463: 2.4.9 dīrghāṇi hasta-śobhīny āloke ca yoṣitāṃ citta-grāhīṇi gauḍāṇāṃ nakhāni syuḥ.
GS39kamasufu:464: 2.4.10 hrasvāni karma-sahiṣṇūni vikalpa-yojanāsu ca svecchāpātīni dākṣiṇatyānām.
GS39kamasufu:467: niyamitair hanu-deśe stanayor adhare vā laghu-karaṇam an:
GS39kamasufu:468: udgata-lekhaṃ sparśa-mātra-jananād romāñca-karam ante saṃnipāta-vardhamāna-śabdam [1] ācchuritakam.
GS39kamasufu:469: 2.4.13 prayojyāyāṃ ca tasyāṅga-saṃvāhane śirasaḥ kaṇḍūyane piṭaka-bhedane vyākulī-karaṇe bhīṣaṇena prayogaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:470: 2.4.14 grīvāyāṃ stana-pṛṣṭhe ca vakro nakha-pada-niveśo [2] ardha-candraḥ.
GS39kamasufu:478: 2.4.22 ūrvoḥ stana-pṛṣṭhe ca pravāsaṃ gacchataḥ smāraṇīyakaṃ saṃhatāś catasras tisro vā lekhāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:482_0: antatvād ānantyāc ca kauśala-vidher abhyāsasya ca sarva-gāmitvād rāgātmakatvāc chedyasya
GS39kamasufu:482_1: prakārān ko 'bhisamīkṣitum arhatīty ācāryāḥ..2.4.25 bhavati hi rāge 'pi citrāpekṣā.
GS39kamasufu:482_2: vaicitryāc ca parasparaṃ rāgo janayitavyaḥ. vaicakṣaṇya-yuktāś ca gaṇikās tat-kāminaś
GS39kamasufu:482_3: ca parasparaṃ prārthanīyā bhavanti. dhanur-vedādiṣv api hi śastra-karma-śāstreṣu
GS39kamasufu:482_4: vaicitryam evāpekṣyate kiṃ punar iheti vātsyāyanaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:483: 2.4.26 na tu para-parigṛhītāsv evaṃ kuryāt. pracchanneṣu pradeśeṣu tāsām anusmaraṇārthaṃ rāga-vardhanāc ca viśeṣān darśayet.
GS39kamasufu:484: 2.4.27v nakha-kṣatāni paśyantyā gūḍha-sthāneṣu yoṣitaḥ. cirotsṛṣṭāpy abhinavā prītir bhavati peśalā((13))..
GS39kamasufu:485: 2.4.28v cirosṛṣṭeṣu rāgeṣu prītir gacchet parābhavam. rāgāyatana-saṃsmāri yadi na syān nakha-kṣatam..
GS39kamasufu:486: 2.4.29v paśyato yuvatiṃ dūrān nakhocchiṣṭa-payodharām. bahu-mānaḥ parasyāpi rāga-yogaś ca jāyate..
GS39kamasufu:487: 2.4.30v puruṣaś ca pradeśeṣu nakha-cihnair vicihnitaḥ. cittaṃ sthiram api prāyaś calayaty eva yoṣitaḥ..
GS39kamasufu:488: 2.4.31v nānyat paṭutaraṃ kiṃ cid asti rāga-vivardhanam. nakha-danta-samutthānāṃ karmaṇāṃ gatayo yathā.
GS39kamasufu:489: 2.4c iti śrīvātyāyanīye kāmasūtre sāṃprayogike dvitīye 'dhikaraṇe caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ. ādito navamaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:493: 2.5.1 uttarauṣṭham antar:mukhaṃ nayanam iti muktvā cumbanavad daśana-radana-sthānāni.
GS39kamasufu:494: 2.5.2 samāḥ snigdha-cchāyā rāga-grāhiṇo yukta-pramāṇā niś:chidrās tīkṣṇāgrā iti daśana-guṇāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:495: 2.5.3 kuṇṭhā rājy-udgatāḥ paruṣāḥ viṣamāḥ ślakṣṇāḥ pṛthavo viralā iti ca doṣāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:498: [3] bindur [4] bindu-mālā [5] pravāla-maṇir [6] maṇi-mālā [7] khaṇḍābhrakaṃ [8] varāha-carvitakam iti daśana-cchedan-vikalpāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:510: 2.5.16 maṇdalam iva viṣama-kūṭaka-yuktaṃ [7] khaṇḍābhrakaṃ stana-pṛṣṭha eva.
GS39kamasufu:511: 2.5.17 saṃhatāḥ pradīrghā bahvyo daśana-pada-rājayas tāmrāntarālā [8] varāha-carvitakam. stana-pṛṣṭha eva.
GS39kamasufu:514: 2.5.19 viśeṣake karṇapūre puṣpa-pīḍe tāmbūla-palāśe tamāla-pattre ceti prayojyāgāmiṣu nakha-daśana- cchedyādīny abhiyogikāni.
GS39kamasufu:523: 2.5.27 dṛḍha-prahaṇana-yoginyaḥ khara-vegā eva apadravya-pradhānāḥ strīrājye kośālāyāṃ ca.
GS39kamasufu:524: 2.5.28 prakṛtyā mṛdvyo rati-priyā a:śuci-rucayo nir:ācārāś ca āndhryaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:528_0: 2.5.31 mṛdyamānāś cābhiyogān mandaṃ mandaṃ prasiñcante draviḍyaḥ..2.5.32 madhyama-vegāḥ
GS39kamasufu:528_1: sarva-sahāḥ svāṅga-pracchādinyaḥ parāṅga-hāsinyaḥ kutsitāślīla-paruṣa- parihāriṇyo vānavāsikāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:530: 2.5.34 deśa-sātmyāt prakṛti-sātmyaṃ balīya iti suvarṇanābhaḥ. na tatra deśyā upacārāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:531: 2.5.35 kāla-yogāc ca deśād deśāntaram upacāra-veṣa-līlāś cānugacchanti tac ca vidyāt.
GS39kamasufu:532: 2.5.36 upagūhanādiṣu ca rāga-vardhanaṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ vicitram uttaram uttaraṃ ca.
GS39kamasufu:533: 2.5.37v vāryamāṇaś ca puruṣo yat kuryāt tad anu kṣatam. a:mṛṣyamāṇā dvi-guṇaṃ tad eva pratiyojayet..
GS39kamasufu:534: 2.5.38v bindoḥ pratikriyā mālā mālāyāś cābhrakhaṇḍakam. iti krodhād ivāviṣṭā kalahān pratiyojayet..
GS39kamasufu:535: 2.5.39v sakacagraham unnamya mukhaṃ tasya tataḥ pibet. nilīyeta daśec caiva tatra tatra maderitā..
GS39kamasufu:536: 2.5.40v unnamya kaṇṭhe kāntasya saṃśritā vakṣasaḥ sthalīm. maṇi-mālāṃ prayuñjīta yac canyad api lakṣitam..
GS39kamasufu:537: 2.5.41v divāpi janasaṃbādhe nāyakena pradarśitam. uddiśya sva-kṛtaṃ cihnaṃ hased anyair a:lakṣitā..
GS39kamasufu:543: 2.5.43v parasparānukūlyena tad evam lajjamānayoḥ. saṃvatsara-śatenāpi prītir na parihīyate..
GS39kamasufu:544: 2.5c iti śrīvātyāyanīye kāmasūtre sāṃprayogike dvitīye 'dhikaraṇe daśana-cchedya--vidhayo deśyāś copacārāḥ pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ. ādito daśamaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:548: 2.6.1 rāga-kāle viśālayanty eva jaghanaṃ mṛgī saṃviśed uccarate.
GS39kamasufu:554: 2.6.7 [1] utphullakaṃ [2] vijṛmbhitakam [3] indrāṇikaṃ ceti tritayaṃ mṛgyāḥ prāyeṇa.
GS39kamasufu:557: 2.6.10 a:nīce sakthinī((19)) tiryag avasajya pratīched iti [2] vijṛmbhitakam.
GS39kamasufu:558: 2.6.11 pārśvayoḥ samam ūrū vinyasya pārśvayor jānunī nidadhyād ity abhyāsa-yogād [3] indrāṇī.
GS39kamasufu:563: 2.6.16 ṛju-prasāritāv ubhāv apy ubhayoḥ caranāv iti [1] saṃpuṭaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:564: 2.6.17 sa dvi-vidhaḥ ṇ pārśva-saṃpuṭa uttāna-saṃpuṭāś ca. tathā karma-yogāt.
GS39kamasufu:565: 2.6.18 pārśveṇa tu śayāno dakṣiṇena nārīm adhiśayīteti sārvatrikam etat.
GS39kamasufu:566: 2.6.19 saṃpuṭaka-prayukta-yantreṇaiva dṛḍham ūrū pīḍayed iti [2] pīḍitakam.
GS39kamasufu:568: 2.6.21 baḍaveva niṣṭhuram avagṛhṇīyād iti [4] bāḍavakam ābhyāsikam.
GS39kamasufu:569: 2.6.22 tad āndhrīṣu prāyeṇa. iti saṃveśana-prakārā bābhravīyāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:571: 2.6.24 ubhāv apy ūrū ūrdhvāv iti tad bhugnakam((20)).
GS39kamasufu:572: 2.6.25 caraṇāv ūrdhvaṃ nāyako 'syā dhārayed iti jṛmbhitakam.
GS39kamasufu:575: 2.6.28 nāyakasyāṃsa eko dvitīyakaḥ prasārita iti punaḥ punar vyatyāsena veṇu-dāritakam.
GS39kamasufu:576: 2.6.29 ekaḥ śirasa upari gacched dvitīyaḥ prasārita iti śūlacitakam ābhyāsikam.
GS39kamasufu:580: 2.6.33 pṛṣṭhaṃ pariṣvajamānāyāḥ parāṅmukheṇa parāvṛttakam ābhyāsikam..2.6.34 jale ca saṃviṣṭopaviṣṭa-sthitātmakāṃś citrān yogān upalakṣayet. tathā su:
GS39kamasufu:582: 2.6.35 vārtaṃ tu tat. śiṣṭair apasmṛtatvād iti vātsyāyanaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:585: 2.6.37 ūrdhva-sthitayor yūnoḥ parasparāpāśrayayoḥ kuḍya-stambhāpāśritayor vā sthita-ratam.
GS39kamasufu:586: 2.6.38 kuḍyāpāśritasya kaṇṭhāvasakta-bāhu-pāśāyās tad-dhasta-pañjaropaviṣṭāyā ūru-pāśena jaghanam abhiveṣṭayantyā kuḍye caraṇa-krameṇa valantyā avalambitakaṃ ratam.
GS39kamasufu:587: 2.6.39 bhūmau vā catuṣpadavad āsthitāyā vṛṣalīlayāvaskandanaṃ dhenukam.
GS39kamasufu:589: 2.6.41 etenaiva yogena śaunam aiṇeyaṃ chāgalaṃ gardabhākrāntaṃ mārjāra-lalitakaṃ vyāghrāvaskandanaṃ gajopamarditaṃ varāha-ghṛṣṭakaṃ turagādhirūḍhakam iti yatra yatra viśeṣo yogo ':
GS39kamasufu:596: strīrājye ca bāhlīke bahavo yuvāno 'ntaḥpura-sa:dharmāṇa ekaikasyāḥ parigraha-bhūtāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:597: 2.6.46 teṣām ekaikaśo yugapac ca yathā:sātmyaṃ yathā:yogaṃ ca rañjayeyuḥ.
GS39kamasufu:598: 2.6.47 eko dhārayed enām anyo niṣeveta. anyo jaghanaṃ mukham anyo madhyam anya iti vāraṃ vāreṇa vyatikareṇa cānutiṣṭheyuḥ.
GS39kamasufu:599: 2.6.48 etayā goṣṭhī-parigrahā veśyā rāja-yoṣā-parigrāhaś ca vyākhyātaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:600: 2.6.49 adhorataṃ pāyāv api dākṣiṇatyānām. iti citra-ratāni.
GS39kamasufu:603: 2.6.51v paśūnāṃ mṛga-jātīnāṃ pataṅgānāṃ ca vibhramaiḥ. tais tair upāyaiś cittajño rati-yogān vivardhayet..
GS39kamasufu:604: 2.6.52v tat-sātmyād deśa-sātmyāc ca tais tair bhāvaiḥ prayojitaiḥ. strīṇāṃ snehaś ca rāgaś ca bahumānaś ca jāyate..
GS39kamasufu:605: 2.6c iti śrīvātyāyanīye kāmasūtre sāṃprayogike dvitīye 'dhikaraṇe saṃveśana-prakārāś citra-ratāni ca ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ. ādito ekadaśaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:609: 2.7.1 kalaha-rūpaṃ su:ratam ācakṣate. vivādātmakatvād vāma-śīlatvāc ca kāmasya.
GS39kamasufu:610: 2.7.2 tasmāt prahaṇanan-sthānam aṅgam. skandhau śiraḥ stanāntaraṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ jaghanaṃ pārśva iti sthānāni.
GS39kamasufu:611: 2.7.3 tac catur-vidham ṇ [1] apahastakaṃ [2] prasṛtakaṃ [3] muṣṭiḥ [4] samatalakam iti.
GS39kamasufu:612: 2.7.4 tad-udbhāvaṃ ca sītkṛtam. tasyāti:rūpatvāt. tad an:eka-vidham.
GS39kamasufu:615: 2.7.7 ambārthāḥ śabdā vāraṇārthā mokṣaṇārthāś cālam-arthās te te [a8] cātha-yogāt.
GS39kamasufu:618: 2.7.10 tatra sāsūyāyā iva [a2]stanita-[a4]rudita-[a3]kūjitāni pratighātaś ca syāt.
GS39kamasufu:621: 2.7.13 tatra [a8]hiṃkārādīnām a:niyamenābhyāsena vikalpena ca tat-kālam eva prayogaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:622: 2.7.14 śirasi kiṃ cid ākuñcitāgulinā kareṇa vivadantyāḥ [a7]phūtkṛtya prahaṇanaṃ tat [2] prasṛtakam.
GS39kamasufu:627: 2.7.19 sarvatra cumbanādiṣv apakrāntāyāḥ sa:sītkṛtaṃ tenaiva pratyuttaram.
GS39kamasufu:628: 2.7.20 rāga-vaśāt prahaṇanābhyāse [a8]vāraṇa-mokṣaṇālam arthānāṃ śabdānāṃ ambārthānāṃ ca sa:
GS39kamasufu:632: 2.7.21 tatra [b9]lāvaka-[b7]haṃsa-vikūjitaṃ tvarayaiva. iti stanana-prahaṇana-yogāḥ..2.7.22 bhavataś cātra ślokau.
GS39kamasufu:633: 2.7.22v pāruṣyaṃ rabhasatvaṃ ca pauruṣaṃ teja ucyate. a:
GS39kamasufu:636: 2.7.23v rāgāt prayoga-sātmyāc ca vyatyayo 'pi kva cid bhavet. na ciraṃ tasya caivānte prakṛter eva yojanam..
GS39kamasufu:637_0: 2.7.24 kīlām usari kartarīṃ śirasi viddhāṃ kapolayoḥ saṃdaṃśikāṃ stanayoḥ pārśvayoś
GS39kamasufu:637_1: ceti pūrvaiḥ saha prahaṇanam aṣṭa-vidham iti dākṣiṇātyānām. tad-yuvatīnām usari kīlāni
GS39kamasufu:639: 2.7.26 tathānyad api deśa-sātmyāt prayuktam anyatra na prayuñjīta.
GS39kamasufu:641: 2.7.28 rati-yoge hi kīlayā gaṇikāṃ citrasenāṃ colarājo jaghāna.
GS39kamasufu:642: 2.7.29 kartaryā kuṇṭalaḥ śātakarṇiḥ śātavāhano mahā-devīṃ malayavatīm.
GS39kamasufu:643: 2.7.30 naradevaḥ kupāṇir((24)) viddhayā nāṭīṃ kāṇāṃ cakāra((25)).
GS39kamasufu:645: 2.7.31v nāsty atra kā cin na ca śāstra-parigrahaḥ. pravṛtte rati-saṃyoge rāga evātra kāraṇam..
GS39kamasufu:646: 2.7.32v svapneṣu na dṛśyante te bhāvās te ca vibhramāḥ. surata-vyavahāreṣu ye syus tat-kṣaṇa-kalpitāḥ..
GS39kamasufu:647: 2.7.33v yathā hi pañcamīṃ dhārām āsthāya turagaḥ pathi. sthānuṃ śvabhraṃ darīṃ vāpi vegāndho na samīkṣate..

GS39kamasufu:1069: 3.4.34 yajñe vivāhe yātrāyām utsave vyasane prekṣaṇaka-vyāpṛte((84)
GS39kamasufu:1071: jane tatra tatra ca dṛṣṭeṅgitākārāṃ parīkṣita-bhāvām ekākinīm upakrameta.
GS39kamasufu:1072: 3.4.35 na hi dṛṣṭa-bhāvā yoṣito deśe kāle ca prayujyamānā((85)) vyāvartanta iti vātsyāyanaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1077: guṇavaty api kanyā dhana-hīnā kulīnāpi samānair a:
GS39kamasufu:1078: yācyamānā mātāpitṛ-viyuktā vā jñāti-kula-vartinī vā prāpta-yauvanā pāṇi-grahaṇaṃ svayam abhīpseta.
GS39kamasufu:1079: 3.4.37 sā tu guṇavantaṃ śaktaṃ su:darśanaṃ bāla-prītyābhiyojayet.
GS39kamasufu:1081: samīkṣayā svayam apy ayam indriya-daurbalyān mayi pravartiṣyata iti priya-hitopacārair abhīkṣṇa-saṃdarśanena ca tam āvarjayet.
GS39kamasufu:1082: 3.4.39 mātā caināṃ sakhībhir dhātreyikābhiś ca saha tad-abhimukhīṃ kuryāt.
GS39kamasufu:1085: kāle ca tad-upasthānam. kalā-kauśala-prakāśane vā saṃvāhane śirasaḥ pīḍane caucitya-darśanam. prayojyasya sātmya-yuktāḥ kathā-yogāḥ bālāyām upakrameṣu yathoktam ācaret((88)).
GS39kamasufu:1088: puruṣaṃ svayam abhiyuñjīta. svayam abhiyoginī hi yuvatiḥ saubhāgyaṃ jahātīty ācāryāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1097: 3.4.46 yadā tu manyetānurakto mayi na vyāvartayiṣyata iti tadaivainam abhiyuñjānaṃ bāla-bhāva- mokṣāya tvaret.
GS39kamasufu:1102: 3.4.48v kanyābhiyujyamānā tu yaṃ manyetāśrayaṃ sukham. anukūlaṃ ca vaśyaṃ ca tasya kuryāt parigraham..
GS39kamasufu:1103: 3.4.49v an:apekṣya guṇān yatra rūpam aucityam eva ca. kurvīta dhana-lobhena patiṃ sāpatnakeṣv api..
GS39kamasufu:1104: 3.4.50v tatra yukta-guṇaṃ vaśyaṃ śaktam balavad arthinam. upāyair abhiyuñjānaṃ kanyā na pratilobhayet..
GS39kamasufu:1106: guṇo 'py ātma-dhāraṇaḥ. guṇair yukto 'pi na tv evaṃ bahu-sādhāraṇaḥ..
GS39kamasufu:1108: avagrahāḥ. bāhye saty upabhoge 'pi nirvisrambhā bahiḥ-sukhāḥ..
GS39kamasufu:1109: 3.4.53v nīco yas tv abhiyuñjīta puruṣaḥ palito 'pi vā. vi:deśa-gati-śīlaś ca na sa saṃyogam arhati..
GS39kamasufu:1110: 3.4.54v yadṛcchayābhiyukto yo dambha-dyūtādhiko 'pi. sa:patnīkaś ca sāpatyo na sa saṃyogam arhati..
GS39kamasufu:1111: 3.4.55v guṇa-sāmye 'bhiyoktṝṇām eko varayitā varaḥ. tatrābhiyoktari śraiṣṭhyam anurāgātmako hi saḥ((94))..
GS39kamasufu:1112: 3.4c iti śrīvātsyāyanīye kāma-sūtre kanyā-saṃprayuktake tṛtīye 'dhikaraṇe eka-puruṣābhiyogā abhiyogataś ca kanyāyāḥ pratipattiś caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1116: 3.5.1 prācuryeṇa((95)) kanyāyā vivikta-darśanasyālābhe dhātreyikāṃ priya-hitābhyām upagṛhyopasarpet.
GS39kamasufu:1118: viditā nāma nāyakasya bhūtvā tad-guṇair anurañjayet. tasyāś ca rucyān nāyaka-guṇān bhūyiṣṭham upavarṇayet.
GS39kamasufu:1119: 3.5.3 anyeṣāṃ varayitṝṇāṃ doṣān abhiprāya-viruddhān pratipādayet..3.5.4 mātāpitroś ca guṇān:
GS39kamasufu:1120: abhijñatāṃ lubdhatāṃ ca capalatāṃ ca bāndhavānām.
GS39kamasufu:1121: 3.5.5 yāś cānyā api samāna-jātīyāḥ kanyāḥ śakuntalādyāḥ sva-buddhyā bhartāraṃ prāpya saṃprayuktā modante sma((96)
GS39kamasufu:1124: 3.5.6 mahā-kuleṣu sāpatnakair bādhyamānā vidviṣṭāḥ duḥkhitāḥ parityaktāś ca dṛśyante.
GS39kamasufu:1126: 3.5.8 sukham an:upahatam eka-cāritāyāṃ nāyakānurāgaṃ ca varṇayet.
GS39kamasufu:1127: 3.5.9 sa:manorathāyāś cāsyā apāyaṃ sādhvasaṃ vrīḍāṃ ca hetubhir avacchindyāt.
GS39kamasufu:1129: 3.5.11 tvām a:jānatīm iva nāyako balād grahīṣyatīti tathā su:parigṛhītaṃ syād iti yojayet.
GS39kamasufu:1130: 3.5.12 pratipannām abhipretāvakāśa-vartinīṃ nāyakaḥ śrotriyāgārād agnim ānayya kuśān āstīrya yathā-smṛti hutvā ca triḥ parikramet.
GS39kamasufu:1132: 3.5.14 agni-sākṣikā hi vivāhā na nivartanta ity ācārya-samayaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1134: 3.5.16 tad-bāndhavāś ca yathā kulasyāghaṃ pariharanto daṇḍa-bhayāc((98)
GS39kamasufu:1136: ca tasmā evaināṃ dadyus tathā yojayet.
GS39kamasufu:1137: 3.5.17 an:antaraṃ ca prīty-upagraheṇa rāgeṇa tad-bāndhavān prīṇayed((99)) iti.
GS39kamasufu:1140: pratipadyamānāyām antaś-cāriṇīm anyāṃ kula-pramadāṃ pūrva saṃsṛṣṭāṃ prīyamāṇāṃ copagṛhya tayā saha viṣahyam avakāśam enām anya-kāryāpadeśenānāyayet.
GS39kamasufu:1141: 3.5.20 tataḥ śrotriyāgārād agnim iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa((100)).
GS39kamasufu:1142: 3.5.21 āsanne ca vivāhe mātaram asyās tad-abhimata-doṣair anuśayaṃ((101)) grāhayet.
GS39kamasufu:1145: niśi nāyakam ānāyya śrotriyāgārād agnim iti sam~ānaṃ pūrveṇa.
GS39kamasufu:1146: 3.5.23 bhrātaram asyā vā samāna-vayasaṃ veśyāsu para-strīṣu vā prasaktam a:
GS39kamasufu:1148: dīrgha-kālam anurañjayet. ante ca svābhiprāyaṃ grāhayet.
GS39kamasufu:1149: 3.5.24 prāyeṇa hi yuvānaḥ samāna-śīla-vyasana-vayasāṃ vayasyānām arthe jīvitam api tyajanti. tatas tenaivānya-kāryāt tām ānāyayet. viṣahyaṃ sāvakāśam((103)
GS39kamasufu:1152: 3.5.25 aṣṭamī-candrikādiṣu ca dhātreyikā madanīyam enāṃ pāyayitvā kiṃ cid ātmanaḥ kāryam uddiśya nāyakasya viṣahyaṃ deśam ānayet. tatraināṃ madāt saṃjñām a:
GS39kamasufu:1154: 3.5.26 suptāṃ caikacāriṇīṃ dhātreyikāṃ vārayitvā saṃjñām a:
GS39kamasufu:1156: 3.5.27 grāmāntaram udyānaṃ vā gacchantīṃ viditvā su:
GS39kamasufu:1157: saṃbhṛta-sahāyo nāyakas tadā rakṣiṇo vitrāsya hatvā vā kanyām apaharet((105)).
GS39kamasufu:1159: 3.5.28v pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ pradhānaṃ syād vivāho dharmataḥ sthiteḥ. pūrvābhāve tataḥ kāryo yo ya uttara uttaraḥ..
GS39kamasufu:1160: 3.5.29v vyūḍhānāṃ hi vivāhānām anurāgaḥ phalaṃ yataḥ. madhyamo 'pi hi sad-yogo gāndharvas tena pūjitaḥ..
GS39kamasufu:1162: bahu-kleśād api cāvaraṇād iha. anurāgātmakatvāc ca gāndharvaḥ pravaro mataḥ((106))..
GS39kamasufu:1163: 3.5c iti śrīvātsyāyanīye kāma-sūtre kanyā-saṃprayuktake tṛtīye 'dhikaraṇe vivāha-yogāḥ pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ..livre 4 bhāryādhikārikaṃ caturtham adhikaraṇam.
GS39kamasufu:1167: 4.1.1 bhāryaikacariṇī gūḍha-viśrambhā((107)) devavat patim ānukulyena varteta.
GS39kamasufu:1173: 4.1.4 na hy ato 'nyad gṛhasthānāṃ citta-grāhakam astīti gonardīyaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1174: 4.1.5 guruṣu bhṛtya-vargeṣu nāyaka-bhaginīṣu((109)) tat-patiṣu ca yathārhaṃ pratipattiḥ((110)).
GS39kamasufu:1175: 4.1.6 paripūteṣu ca harita-śāka-vaprān ikṣu-stambāñ jīraka-sarṣapājamoda-śatapuṣpā-tamāla-gulmāṃś ca kārayet((111)).
GS39kamasufu:1176_1: anyāṃś ca bahu-puṣpān bāla-kośīraka-pātālikāṃś ca vṛkṣa-vāṭikāyāṃ ca sthaṇḍilāṇi
GS39kamasufu:1177: 4.1.8 madhye kūpaṃ vāpīṃ dīrghikāṃ vā khānayet.
GS39kamasufu:1179: 4.1.10 bhojane ca rucitam idam asmai dveṣyam idaṃ pathyam idam a:pathyam idam iti ca vindyāt.
GS39kamasufu:1180: 4.1.11 svaraṃ bahir upaśrutya bhavanam āgacchataḥ kiṃ kṛtyam iti bruvatī sajjā((113)
GS39kamasufu:1184: 4.1.13 nāyakasya ca na vimukta-bhūṣaṇaṃ vijane saṃdarśane tiṣṭhet.
GS39kamasufu:1185: 4.1.14 ati:vyayam a:sad-vyayaṃ vā kurvāṇaṃ rahasi bodhayet.
GS39kamasufu:1186: 4.1.15 āvāhe vivāhe yajñe gamanaṃ sakhībhiḥ saha goṣṭhīṃ devatābhigamanm ity anujñātā kuryāt.
GS39kamasufu:1188: 4.1.17 paścāt saṃveśanaṃ pūrvam utthānam an:avabodhanaṃ ca suptasya.
GS39kamasufu:1189: 4.1.18 mahānasaṃ ca su:guptaṃ syād darśanīyaṃ ca.
GS39kamasufu:1190: 4.1.19 nāyakāpacāreṣu kiṃ cit kaluṣitā nāty:arthaṃ nirvadet.
GS39kamasufu:1191: 4.1.20 sādhikṣepa-vacanaṃ tv enaṃ mitra-jana-madhya-stham ekākinaṃ vāpy upālabheta. na ca mūla-kārikā syāt.
GS39kamasufu:1192: 4.1.21 na hy ato 'nyad a:pratyaya-kāraṇam astīti gonardīyaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1195: nirīkṣitam anyato mantraṇaṃ dvāra-deśāvasthānaṃ nirīkṣaṇaṃ vā niṣkuṭeṣu((114)
GS39kamasufu:1197: mantraṇaṃ vivikteṣu ciram avasthānam iti varjayet.
GS39kamasufu:1199: 4.1.24 bahu-bhūṣaṇaṃ vividha-kusumānulepanaṃ vividhāṅga-rāga-samujjvalaṃ vāsa ity ābhigāmiko veṣaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1202: anulepanam. tathā śuklāny anyāni puṣpāṇīti vaihāriko veṣaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1203: 4.1.26 nāyakasya vratam upavāsaṃ ca svayam api karaṇenānuvarteta. vāritāyāṃ ca nāham atra nirbandhanīyeti tad-vacaso nivartanam.
GS39kamasufu:1205: 4.1.28 tathā lavaṇa-snehayoś ca gandha-dravya-kaṭuka-bhāṇḍauṣadhānāṃ ca dur:
GS39kamasufu:1207_1: svayamguptā-tila-parṇikāgnimantha-laśuna-palāṇḍu-prabhṛtīnāṃ sarvauṣadhīnāṃ ca bīja-grahaṇaṃ kāle vāpaś ca.
GS39kamasufu:1208: 4.1.30 svasya ca sārasya parebhyo nākhyānaṃ bhartṛ-mantritasya ca.
GS39kamasufu:1209: 4.1.31 samānāś ca striyaḥ kauśalenojjvalatayā pākena mānena tathopacārair atiśayīta.
GS39kamasufu:1210: 4.1.32 sāṃvatsarikam āyaṃ saṃkhyāya tad-anurūpaṃ vyayaṃ kuryāt.
GS39kamasufu:1211_0: 4.1.33 bhojanāvaśiṣṭād go-rasād ghṛta-karaṇam tathā tela-guḍayoḥ. karpāsasya ca sūtra-kartanam
GS39kamasufu:1212_0: 4.1.34 taj-jaghanyānāṃ ca jīrṇa-vāsasāṃ saṃcayas tair vividha-rāgaiḥ śuddhair vā
GS39kamasufu:1212_1: kṛta-karmaṇāṃ paricārakāṇām anugraho mānārtheṣu ca dānam anyatra vopayogaḥ..4.1.35
GS39kamasufu:1212_2: surā-kumbhīnām āsava-kumbhīnāṃ ca sthāpanaṃ tad-upayogaḥ kraya-vikrayāv āya-vyāyāvekṣaṇam.
GS39kamasufu:1225: 4.1.42 pravāse maṅgala-mātrābharaṇā devatopavāsa-parā vārtāyāṃ sthitā gṛhān avekṣeta.
GS39kamasufu:1226: 4.1.43 śayyā ca guru-jana-mūle. tad-abhimatā kārya-niṣpattiḥ. nāyakābhimatānāṃ cārthānām arjane pratisaṃskāre ca yatnaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1227: 4.1.44 nitya-naimittikeṣu karmasūcito vyayaḥ. tad-ārabdhānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ samāpane matiḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1230: . tatrāpi nāyaka-parijanādhiṣṭhitāyā nātikālam avasthānam a:parivartita-pravāsa-veṣatā ca.
GS39kamasufu:1231: 4.1.46 guru-janānujñātānāṃ karaṇam upavāsānām. paricārakaiḥ śucibhir ājñādhiṣṭhitair anumatena kraya-vikraya-karmaṇā sārasyāpūraṇaṃ tanū-karaṇaṃ ca śaktyā vyayānām.
GS39kamasufu:1232: 4.1.47 āgate ca prakṛtisthāyā eva prathamato darśanaṃ daivata-pūjanam upahārāṇāṃ cāharaṇam.
GS39kamasufu:1237: anuvarteta nāyakasya hitaiṣiṇī. kula-yoṣā punarbhūr vā veśyā vāpy ekacāriṇī.. dharmam arthaṃ tathā kāmaṃ labhante sthānam eva ca. niḥ:
GS39kamasufu:1238: sapatnaṃ ca bhartāraṃ nāryaḥ sad-vṛttam āśritāḥ..
GS39kamasufu:1239: 4.1c iti śrīvātsyāyanīye kāmasūtre bhāryādhikārike caturthe 'dhikaraṇe ekacāriṇī-vṛttaṃ pravāsa-cāryā ca prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1244: utpatter ābhīkṣṇyena dārikotpatter nāyaka-cāpalād vā sapatny-adhivedanam.
GS39kamasufu:1245: 4.2.2 tad ādita eva bhakti-śīla-vaidagdhya-khyāpanena parijihīrṣet. prajā:
GS39kamasufu:1246: nutpattau ca svayam eva sāpatnake codayet.
GS39kamasufu:1247: 4.2.3 adhividyamānā ca yāvac chakti-yogād ātmano 'dhikatvena sthitiṃ kārayet.
GS39kamasufu:1248: 4.2.4 āgatāṃ caināṃ bhaginīvad īkṣeta. nayaka-viditaṃ ca prādoṣikaṃ vidhimatīva yatnād asyāḥ kārayet. saubhāgyajaṃ vaikṛtam utsekaṃ vāsyā nādriyeta.
GS39kamasufu:1249: 4.2.5 bhartari pramādyantīm upekṣeta. yatra manyetārtham iyaṃ svayam api pratipatsyata iti tatrainām ādarata evānuśiṣyāt.
GS39kamasufu:1250: 4.2.6 nāyaka-saṃśrave ca rahasi viśeṣān adhikān darśayet.
GS39kamasufu:1252: viśeṣaḥ. parijana-varge 'dhikānukampā. mitra-varge prītiḥ. ātma-jñātiṣu nāty:
GS39kamasufu:1255: 4.2.9 yāṃ tu nāyako 'dhikāṃ cikīrṣet tāṃ bhūta-pūrva-subhagayā protsāhya kalahayet.
GS39kamasufu:1257: 4.2.11 tābhir ekatvenādhikāṃ cikirṣītāṃ svayam a:vivadamānā dur:janī:kuryāt.
GS39kamasufu:1258: 4.2.12 nāyakena tu kalahitām enāṃ pakṣapātāvalambanopabṛmhitām āśvāsayet.
GS39kamasufu:1260: 4.2.14 mandaṃ vā kalaham upalabhya svayam eva saṃdhukṣayet.
GS39kamasufu:1261: 4.2.15 yadi nāyako 'syām adyāpi sānunaya iti manyeta tadā svayameva sandhau prayateta.
GS39kamasufu:1268: 4.2.20 na vā tasyā vacanam anyasyāḥ kathayet.
GS39kamasufu:1269: 4.2.21 tad-apatyāni svebhyo 'dhikāni paśyet..4.2.22 rahasi patim adhikam upacaret.
GS39kamasufu:1271: 4.2.24 patyuṣ ca sa:viśeṣakaṃ gūḍhaṃ mānaṃ lipset.
GS39kamasufu:1273: 4.2.26 tat tu ślāghayā rāgeṇa vā bāhir nācakṣīta.
GS39kamasufu:1275: 4.2.28 jyeṣṭhā-bhayāc ca nigūḍha-saṃmānārthinī syād iti gonardīyaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1276: 4.2.29 dur:bhāgam an:apatyāṃ ca jyeṣṭhām anukampeta nāyakena cānukampayet.
GS39kamasufu:1280: 4.2.31 vidhavā tv indriya-daurbalyād āturā bhoginaṃ guṇa-saṃpannaṃ ca yā punar vindet sā punarbhūḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1281: 4.2.32 yatas tu svecchayā punar api niṣkramaṇaṃ nir:guṇo 'yam iti tadānyaṃ kāṅkṣed iti bābhravīyāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1283: 4.2.34 guṇeṣu sopabhogeṣu sukha-sākalyaṃ tasmāt tato viśeṣa iti gonardīyaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1285: 4.2.36 sā bāndhavair nāyakād āpānakodyāna-śraddhā-dāna-mitra-pūjanādi vyaya-sahiṣṇu karma lipseta.
GS39kamasufu:1286: 4.2.37 ātmanaḥ sāreṇa vālaṅkāraṃ tadīyam ātmīyaṃ vā bibhṛyāt.
GS39kamasufu:1288: 4.2.39 svecchayā ca gṛhān nirgacchatī prīti-dāyād anyan nāyaka-dattaṃ jīyeta. niṣkāsyamānā tu na kiṃ cid dadyāt.
GS39kamasufu:1289: 4.2.40 sā prabhaviṣṇur iva tasya bhavanam āpnuyāt.
GS39kamasufu:1292: parihāsā mitreṣu pratipattiḥ. kalāsu kauśalam adhikasya ca jñānam.
GS39kamasufu:1295: patnīnāṃ ca svayam upakuryāt. tāsām apatyeṣv ābhāraṇa-dānam. teṣu svāmivad upacāraḥ. maṇḍanakāni veṣānādareṇa kurvīta. parijane mitravarge cādhikaṃ viśrāṇanam((123)
GS39kamasufu:1300: 4.2.45 durbhagā tu sāpatnaka-pīḍitā yā tāsām adhikam iva patyāv upacaret tām āśrayet. prakāśyāni ca kalā-vijñānāni darśayet. daurbhāgyād rahasyānām a:bhāvaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1302: 4.2.47 tan-mitrāṇi copagṛhya tair bhaktim ātmanaḥ prakāśayet.
GS39kamasufu:1303: 4.2.48 dharma-kṛtyeṣu ca puraś-cāriṇī syād vratopavāsayoś ca.
GS39kamasufu:1304: 4.2.49 parijane dākṣiṇyam. na cādhikam ātmānaṃ paśyet.
GS39kamasufu:1306: 4.2.51 na copālabheta vāmatāṃ ca na darśayet.
GS39kamasufu:1307: 4.2.52 yayā ca kalahitaḥ syāt kāmaṃ tām āvartayet.
GS39kamasufu:1308: 4.2.53 yāṃ ca pracchannāṃ kāmayet tām anena saha saṃgamayed gopayec ca.
GS39kamasufu:1309: 4.2.54 yathā ca pativratātvam a:śāṭhyaṃ nāyako manyeta tathā pratividadhyāt.
GS39kamasufu:1312: 4.2.55 antaḥ-purāṇāṃ ca vṛttam eteṣv eva prakaraṇeṣu lakṣayet((126)).
GS39kamasufu:1313: 4.2.56 mālyānulepana-vāsāṃśi cāsāṃ kañcukīyā mahattarikā vā rājño nivedayeyur devībhiḥ prahitam iti.
GS39kamasufu:1314: 4.2.57 tad ādāya rājā nirmālyam āsāṃ pratiprābhṛtakaṃ dadyāt.

GS39kamasufu:1527: 5.4.29 nāyaka-manoratheṣu ca kathyamāneṣu sa:paribhavaṃ nāma hasati. na ca nirvadatīti.
GS39kamasufu:1533: 5.4.35 a:saṃstutayor a:dṛṣṭākārayor api dūtī-pratyayād iti vātsyāyanaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1534: 5.4.36 tāsāṃ mano-harāṇy upāyanāni tāmbūlam anulepanaṃ srajam aṅgulīyakaṃ vāso vā tena prahitaṃ darśayet.
GS39kamasufu:1535: 5.4.37 teṣu nāyakasya yathārthaṃ nakha-daśana-padāni tāni tāni ca cihnāni syuḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1537: 5.4.39 patra-cchedyāni nānābhiprāyākṛtīni darśayet. lekha-pattra-garbhāṇi karṇa-pattrāṇy āpīḍāṃś ca.
GS39kamasufu:1540_0: 5.4.42 sa tu devatābhigamane yātrāyām udyāna-krīḍāyāṃ jalāvataraṇe vivāhe yajña-vyasanotsaveṣv
GS39kamasufu:1540_1: agny-utpāte caura-vibhrame janapadasya cakrārohaṇe prekṣa-vyāpāreṣu teṣu teṣu ca
GS39kamasufu:1542: 5.4.44 tasyā eva tu gehe vidita-niṣkrama-praveśe cintitātyaya-pratīkāre praveśanam upapannaṃ niṣkramaṇam a:
GS39kamasufu:1543: vijñāta-kālaṃ ca tan nityaṃ sukhopāyaṃ ceti vātsyāyanaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1544: 5.4.45 nisṛṣṭārthā[1] parimitārthā[2] patra-hārī[3] svayaṃdūtī[4] mūḍha-dūtī[5] bhāryā-dūtī[6] mūka-dūtī[7] vāta-dūtī[8] ceti dūtī-viśeṣāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1545: 5.4.46 nāyakasya nāyikāyāś ca yathāmanīṣitam artham upalabhya sva-buddhyā kārya-saṃpādinī nisṛṣṭārthā[1].
GS39kamasufu:1548: 5.4.49 kautukāc cānurūpau yuktāv imau parasparasyety a:saṃstutayor api.
GS39kamasufu:1549: 5.4.50 kāryaikadeśam abhiyogaikadeśaṃ copalabhya śeṣaṃ saṃpādayatīti parimitārthā[2].
GS39kamasufu:1553_0: 5.4.54 dautyena prahitānyayā svayam eva nāyakam abhigacched ajānatī nāma tena sahopabhogaṃ
GS39kamasufu:1553_1: svāpne vā kathayet. gotra-skhalitaṃ bhāryāṃ cāsya nindet. td-vyapadeśena svayam īrṣyāṃ
GS39kamasufu:1553_2: darśayet. nakha-daśana-cihnitaṃ vā kiṃ cid dadyāt. bhavate 'ham ādau dātuṃ saṃkalpiteti
GS39kamasufu:1553_3: cābhidadhīta. mama bhāryāyā kā ramaṇīyeti vivikte paryanuyuñjīta sā svayaṃ-dūtī[4].
GS39kamasufu:1555: 5.4.56 pratigraha-cchalenānyām abhisaṃdhāyāsyāḥ saṃdeśāśravaṇa-dvāreṇa nāyakaṃ sādhayet tāṃ copahanyāt sāpi svayaṃ-dūtī[4].
GS39kamasufu:1557_0: 5.4.58 nāyaka-bhāryāṃ mugdhāṃ viśvāsyāyantraṇayānupraviśya nāyakasya ceṣṭitāni pṛcchet.
GS39kamasufu:1557_1: yogāñ śikṣayet. sākāraṃ maṇḍayet. kopam enāṃ grāhayet. evaṃ ca pratipadyasveti śrāvayet.
GS39kamasufu:1557_2: svayaṃ cāsyāṃ nakha-daśanapadāni nirvartayet. tena dvāreṇa nāyākam ākārayet sā mūḍha-dūtī[5].
GS39kamasufu:1559: 5.4.60 sva-bhāryāṃ vā mūḍhaṃ prayojya tayā saha viśvāsena yojayitvā tayaivākārayet. ātmanaś ca vaicakṣaṇyaṃ prakāśayet. sā bhāryā-dutī[6] tasyās tayaivākāra-grahaṇam.
GS39kamasufu:1562: duṣṭenopāyena prahiṇuyāt. tatra sraji karṇapattre vā gūḍha-lekha-nidhānaṃ nakha-daśana-padam vā sā mūka-dūtī[7]. tasyās tayaiva pratyuttara-prārthanam.
GS39kamasufu:1564: grahaṇīyaṃ laukikārthaṃ vyarthaṃ vā vacanam udāsīnā yā śrāvayet sā vāta-dūtī[8]. tasyā api tayaiva pratyuttara-prārthanam
GS39kamasufu:1565: 5.4.62c iti tāsāṃ viśeṣāḥ..5.4.63 bhavanti cātra ślokāḥ
GS39kamasufu:1566: 5.4.63v vidhavekṣaṇikā dāsī bhikṣukī śilpa-kārikā. praviśaty āsu viśvāsaṃ dūtī-kāryaṃ ca vindati..
GS39kamasufu:1568: 5.4.64v vidveṣaṃ grāhayet patyau ramaṇīyāni varṇayet. citrān surata-saṃbhogān anyāsām api darśayet..
GS39kamasufu:1569: 5.4.65v nāyakasyānurāgaṃ ca punaś ca rati-kauśalam. prārthanāṃ cādhika-strībhir avaṣṭambhaṃ ca varṇayet..
GS39kamasufu:1571: saṃkalpitam apy artham utsṛṣṭaṃ doṣa-kāraṇāt. punar āvartayaty eva dūtī vacana-kauśalāt((144))..
GS39kamasufu:1572: 5.4c iti śrīvātsyāyanīye kāmasūtre pāradārike pañcame 'dhikaraṇe dūtī-karmāṇi caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1576: 5.5.1 na rājñāṃ mahāmātrāṇāṃ vā para-bhavana-praveśo vidyate.mahājanena hi caritam eṣāṃ dṛśyate 'nuvidhīyate ca.
GS39kamasufu:1577: 5.5.2 savitāram udyantaṃ trayo lokāḥ paśyanti anūdyante ca. gacchantam api paśyanty anupratiṣṭhante ca.
GS39kamasufu:1578: 5.5.3 tasmād a:śakyatvād garhaṇīyatvāc ceti na te vṛthā kiṃ cid ācareyuḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1582: yūno grāmīṇa-yoṣito vacana-mātra- sādhyāḥ. tāś carṣaṇya((146)
GS39kamasufu:1585_0: 5.5.6 tābhiḥ saha viṣṭi-karmasu koṣṭhāgāra-praveśe dravyāṇāṃ niṣkramaṇa-praveśanayor
GS39kamasufu:1585_2: dravyāṇāṃ kraya-vikraya-vinimayeṣu teṣu teṣu ca karmasu prayogaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1594: purikānāṃ pṛthak pṛthag bhogāvāsakān praviśya kathābhir āsitvā pūjitāḥ pratītāś copapradoṣaṃ niṣkrāmayeyuḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1595: 5.5.13 tatra praṇihitā rāja-dāsī prayojyāyāḥ pūrva-saṃsṛṣṭā tāṃ tatra saṃbhāṣeta.
GS39kamasufu:1597: 5.5.15 prāg eva sva-bhavana-sthāṃ brūyāt. amuṣyāṃ krīḍāyāṃ tava rāja-bhavana-sthānāni rāmaṇīyakāni darśayiṣyāmīti kāle ca yojayet. bahiḥ:
GS39kamasufu:1601: samudra-gṛha-prāsādān gūḍha-bhitti-saṃcārāṃś citra-karmāṇi krīḍā-mṛgān yantrāṇi śakunān vyāghra-siṃha-pañjarādīni ca yāni purastād varṇitāni syuḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1606: pratipadyamānāṃ svayam eveśvara āgatyopacāraiḥ sāntvitāṃ rañjayitvā saṃbhūya ca sānurāgaṃ visṛjet.
GS39kamasufu:1607: 5.5.21 prayojyāyāś ca patyur anugrahocitasya dārān nityam antaḥ:
GS39kamasufu:1608: puram aucityāt praveśayet. tatra praṇihitā rāja-dāsīti samānaṃ pūrveṇa.
GS39kamasufu:1611: ceṭikā-saṃpreṣaṇena prītiṃ kuryāt. prasṛta-prītiṃ ca sāpadeśaṃ darśane niyojayet. praviṣṭāṃ pūjitāṃ pītavatīṃ praṇihitā rāja-dāsīti samānaṃ pūrveṇa.
GS39kamasufu:1612: 5.5.23 yasmin vā vijñāne prayojyā vikhyātā syāt tad-darśanārtham antaḥ:
GS39kamasufu:1613: purikā sopacāraṃ tām āhvayet. praviṣṭāṃ praṇihitā rāja-dāsīti samānaṃ pūrveṇa.
GS39kamasufu:1615: arthasya bhītasya vā bhāryāṃ bhikṣukī brūyāt asāv antaḥ:
GS39kamasufu:1616: purikā rājani siddhā gṛhīta-vākyā mama vacanaṃ śṛṇoti. sva-bhāvataś ca kṛpā-śīlā tām anenopāyenādhigamiṣyāmi. aham eva te praveśaṃ kārayiṣyāmi. sā ca te bhartur mahāntam an:
GS39kamasufu:1617: arthaṃ nivartayiṣyatīti pratipannāṃ dvis trir iti praveśayet. antaḥ:
GS39kamasufu:1620: bhaya-śravaṇāc ca saṃprahṛṣṭāṃ praṇihitā rāja-dāsīti samānaṃ pūrveṇa..5.5.25 etayā vṛtty-arthināṃ mahāmātrābhitaptānāṃ balād vigṛhītānāṃ vyavahāre dur:
GS39kamasufu:1622: saṃtuṣṭānāṃ rājani prīti-kāmānāṃ rājya-janeṣu paṅktim icchatāṃ sa-jātair bādhyamānānāṃ sa:
GS39kamasufu:1623: jātān bādhitu-kāmānāṃ sūcakānām anyeṣām kārya-vaśināṃ jāyā vyākhyātāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1624: 5.5.26 anyena vā prayojyāṃ saha saṃsṛṣṭāṃ saṃgrāhya dāsyam upanītāṃ krameṇāntaḥ:puraṃ praveśayet.
GS39kamasufu:1625: 5.5.27 praṇidhinā cāyatim asyāḥ saṃdūṣya rājani vidviṣṭa iti kalatrāvagrahopāyenainām antaḥ:
GS39kamasufu:1629: 5.5.28 na tv evaṃ para-bhavanam īśvaraḥ praviśet.
GS39kamasufu:1632: para-bhavana-gataṃ bhrātṛ-prayukto rajako jaghāna. kāśi-rājaṃ jayasenam aśvādhyakṣa iti.
GS39kamasufu:1634: 5.5.31 prattā janapada-kanyā daśame 'hani kiṃ cid aupāyanikam upagṛhya praviśanty antaḥ:
GS39kamasufu:1635: puram upabhuktā eva visṛjyanta ity āndhrāṇām((151)).
GS39kamasufu:1636: 5.5.32 mahāmātreśvarāṇām antaḥ:purāṇi niśi sevārthaṃ rājānam upagacchanti vātsagulmakānām.
GS39kamasufu:1637: 5.5.33 rūpavatīr janapada-yoṣitaḥ prīty-apadeśena māsaṃ māsārdhaṃ vātivāsayanty antaḥ:
GS39kamasufu:1639: 5.5.34 darśanīyāḥ sva-bhāryāḥ prīti-dāyam eva mahāmātra-rājabhyo dadaty aparāntakānām.
GS39kamasufu:1640: 5.5.35 rāja-krīḍārthaṃ nagara-striyo janapada-striyaś ca saṅghaśa ekaśaś ca rājakulaṃ praviśanti saurāṣṭrakāṇām iti.
GS39kamasufu:1642: 5.5.36v ete cānye ca bahavaḥ prayogāḥ pāradārikāḥ. deśe deśe pravartante rājabhiḥ saṃpravartitāḥ..
GS39kamasufu:1643: 5.5.37v na tv evaitān prayuñjīta rājā loka-hite rataḥ. nigṛhītāri-ṣaḍ-vargas tathā vijayate mahīm((152))..
GS39kamasufu:1644: 5.5c iti śrīvātsyāyanīye kāmasūtre pāradārike pañcame 'dhikaraṇe īśvara-kāmitam pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1649: purāṇāṃ rakṣaṇa-yogāt puruṣa-saṃdarśanaṃ vidyate patyuś caikatvād an:
GS39kamasufu:1651: tṛptiḥ. tasmāt tāni prayogata eva paras-paraṃ rañjayeyuḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1652: 5.6.2 dhātreyikāṃ sakhīṃ dāsīṃ vā puruṣavad alaṃkṛtyākṛti-saṃyuktaiḥ kanda-mūla-phalāvayavair apadravyair vātmābhiprāyaṃ nivartayeyuḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1654_0: 5.6.4 rājānaś ca kṛpā-śīlā vināpi bhāva-yogād āyojitāpadravyā yāvad artham ekayā
GS39kamasufu:1654_1: rātryā bahvībhir api gacchanti. yasyāṃ tu prītir vāsaka ṛtur vā tatrābhiprāyataḥ
GS39kamasufu:1656: labdha-vṛttīnāṃ viyoniṣu vijātiṣu strī-pratimāsu kevalopamardanāc cābhiprāya-nivṛttir vyākhyātā.
GS39kamasufu:1657: 5.6.6 yoṣāveṣāṃś ca nāgarakān prāyeṇānta:purikāḥ paricārikābhiḥ saha praveśayanti.
GS39kamasufu:1658: 5.6.7 teṣām upāvartane dhātreyikāś cābhyantara-saṃsṛṣṭā āyatiṃ darśayantyaḥ prayateran.
GS39kamasufu:1659: 5.6.8 sukha-praveśitām apasāra-bhūmiṃ viśalatāṃ veśmanaḥ pramādaṃ rakṣiṇām a:
GS39kamasufu:1661: 5.6.9 na cā:sad-bhūtenārthena praveśayituṃ janam āvartayeyur doṣāt.
GS39kamasufu:1662: 5.6.10 nāgarakas tu su:prāpam apy antaḥ:puram apāya-bhūyiṣṭhatvān na praviśed iti vātsyāyanaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1663_1: proṣita-rājakaṃ kāraṇāni samīkṣya bahuṣa āhūyamāno 'rtha-buddhyā kakṣyā-praveśaṃ
GS39kamasufu:1663_2: ca dṛṣṭvā tābhir eva vihitopāyaḥ praviśet.
GS39kamasufu:1665: 5.6.13 bahiś ca rakṣibhir anyad eva kāraṇam apadiśya saṃsṛjeta.
GS39kamasufu:1667: cāriṇyāṃ ca paricārikāyāṃ viditārthāyāṃ saktam ātmānaṃ rūpayet. tad-a:
GS39kamasufu:1671: 5.6.16 dūtyās tv a:saṃcāre yatra gṛhītākārāyāḥ prayojyāyā darśana-yogas tatrāvasthānam.
GS39kamasufu:1673_0: 5.6.18 cakṣur anubadhnantyām iṅgitākāra-nivedanam..5.6.19 yatra saṃpāto 'syās tatra
GS39kamasufu:1673_1: citra-karmaṇas tad-yuktasya vyarthānāṃ gīta-vastukānāṃ krīḍanakānāṃ kṛta-cihnānām āpīnakānām((153)
GS39kamasufu:1676: 5.6.20 praty:uttaraṃ tayā dattaṃ prapaśyet. tataḥ praveśane yateta.
GS39kamasufu:1677: 5.6.21 yatra cāsya niyataṃ gamanam iti vidyāt tatra prachannasya prāg evāvasthānam.
GS39kamasufu:1681_0: 5.6.25 tatrāyaṃ prayogaḥ ṇ nakula-hṛdayaṃ corakatumbī-phalāni sarpākṣīṇi cāntardhūmena
GS39kamasufu:1681_1: pacet. tato 'ñjanena sama-bhāgena peṣayet. anenābhyakta-nayano naṣṭa-cchāyā-rūpaś
GS39kamasufu:1684: 5.6.27v dravyāṇām api nirhāre pānakānāṃ praveśane. āpānakotsavārthe 'pi ceṭikānāṃ ca saṃbhrame..
GS39kamasufu:1685: 5.6.27v vyatyāse veśmanāṃ caiva rakṣiṇāṃ ca viparyaye. udyāna-yātrā-gamane yātrātaś ca praveśane..
GS39kamasufu:1686: 5.6.27v dīrgha-kālodayāṃ yātrāṃ proṣite cāpi rājani. praveśanaṃ bhavet prāyo yūnāṃ niṣkramaṇaṃ tathā..
GS39kamasufu:1687: 5.6.28v parasparasya kāryāṇi jñātvā cāntaḥpurālayāḥ. eka-kāryās tataḥ kuryuḥ śeṣāṇām api bhedanam..
GS39kamasufu:1689: bhedyatāṃ gataḥ sadyo yatheṣṭaṃ phalam aśnute..
GS39kamasufu:1690: 5.6.29 tatra rāja-kula-cāriṇya eva lakṣaṇyān puruṣān antaḥ:
GS39kamasufu:1695: 5.6.31 preṣyābhiḥ saha tad-veṣān nāgaraka-putrān praveśayanti vātsagulmakānām.
GS39kamasufu:1696: 5.6.32 svair eva putrair antaḥ:purāṇi kāma-cārair jananī-varjam upayujyante vaidarbhakānām.
GS39kamasufu:1697: 5.6.33 tathā praveśibhir eva jñāti-saṃbandhibhir nānyair upayujyante strairājakānām.
GS39kamasufu:1698: 5.6.34 brāhmaṇair mitrair bhṛtyair dāsa-ceṭaiś ca gauḍānām.
GS39kamasufu:1699: 5.6.35 parispandāḥ karmakarāś cāntaḥ:pureṣv a:niṣidddhā anye 'pi tad-rūpāś ca saindhavānām.
GS39kamasufu:1700: 5.6.36 arthena rakṣiṇam upagṛhya sāhasikāḥ saṃhatāḥ praviśanti haimavatānām.
GS39kamasufu:1702: purāṇi gacchanti. paṭāntaritaś caiṣām ālāpaḥ. tena prasaṅgena vyatikaro bhavati baṅga-aṅga-kaliṅgakānām.
GS39kamasufu:1703: 5.6.38 saṃhatya navadaśety ekaikaṃ yuvānaṃ pracchādayanti prācyānām iti. evaṃ para-striyaḥ prakurvīta.
GS39kamasufu:1706: 5.6.39 ebhya eva ca kāraṇebhyaḥ sva-dārān rakṣet.
GS39kamasufu:1708: 5.6.41 te hi bhayena cārthena cānyaṃ prayojayeyus tasmāt kāma-bhayārthopadhā-śuddhān iti goṇikāputraḥ((157)).
GS39kamasufu:1709: 5.6.42 a:droho dharmas tam api bhayāj jahyād ato dharma-bhayopadhā-śuddhān iti vātsyāyanaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:1713: 5.6.44 duṣṭānāṃ yuvatiṣu siddhatvān nā:kasmād a:duṣṭa-dūṣaṇam ācared iti vātsyāyanaḥ((159)).
GS39kamasufu:1717: niyantraṇatā pravāse 'vasthānaṃ videśe nivāsaḥ sva-vṛtty-upaghātaḥ svairiṇī-saṃsargaḥ patyur īrṣyālutā ceti strīṇāṃ vināśa-kāraṇāni.
GS39kamasufu:1718: 5.6.46v saṃdṛśya śāstrato yogān pāradārika-lakṣitān. na yāti cchalanāṃ kaś cid sva-dārān prati śāstravit..
GS39kamasufu:1719: 5.6.47v pākṣikatvāt prayogāṇām apāyānāṃ ca darśanāt. dharmārthayoś ca vailomyān nācaret pāradārikam..
GS39kamasufu:1720: 5.6.48v tad etad dāra-gupty-artham ārabdhaṃ śreyase nṛṇām. prajānāṃ dūṣaṇāyaiva na vijñeyo 'sya saṃvidhiḥ((160))..
GS39kamasufu:1721: 5.6c iti śrivātsyāyanīye kāmasūtre pāradārike pañcame 'dhikaraṇe īśvarkāmitaṃ pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ..livre 6 vaiśikaṃ ṣaṣṭam adhikaraṇam.
GS39kamasufu:1725: 6.1.1 veśyānāṃ puruṣādhigame ratir vṛttiś ca sargāt.
GS39kamasufu:1731: 6.1.7 nityam alaṅkāra-yoginī rāja-mārgāvalokinī dṛśyamānā na cātivṛttā tiṣṭhet. paṇya-sa: dharmatvāt.
GS39kamasufu:1732: 6.1.8 yair nāyakam āvarjayed anyābhyaś cāvacchindyād ātmanaś cān:
GS39kamasufu:1733: arthaṃ pratikuryād arthaṃ ca sādhayen na ca gamyaiḥ paribhūyeta tān sahāyān kuryāt.

GS39kamasufu:2770: . le parallèle avec les épreuves de as.1.1.10 est clair,
GS39kamasufu:2772: ils doivent avoir subi avec succès trois épreuves : kāma-Ś, bhaya-Ś, artha-Ś.
GS39kamasufu:2775: . il s'agit alors d'épreuves [la forme verbale upadadhyāt // upadhā- en atteste] destinées à s'assurer de la fidélité des femmes et non,
GS39kamasufu:2777: de leurs gardiens. ceci est peut être à mettre en rapport avec as.1.1.20.14 “in the inner appartments,
GS39kamasufu:2778: he should visit the queen after she is cleared (of suspicion)
GS39kamasufu:2779: by old women.” (antargṛha-gataḥ sthavira-strī-pariśuddhāṃ devīṃ paśyet.).
GS39kamasufu:2783: vātsyāyana énonce une opinion comparable à celle de kauṭilya au sujet des épreuves [1.10.18v-19v] :
GS39kamasufu:2784: “he should not effect the corruption of the uncorrupted (na dūṣaṇam a:duṣṭasya... caret)
GS39kamasufu:2785: as of water by poison; for,
GS39kamasufu:2786: it may well happen that a cure may not be found for one corrupted [18]. and the mind,
GS39kamasufu:2787: perverted by the fourfold secret tests,
GS39kamasufu:2788: may not turn back without going to the end,
GS39kamasufu:2789: remaining fixed in the will of spirited persons [19].”; opinion qui se retrouve aussi en 1.17.30-32,
GS39kamasufu:2790: mais au sujet du prince héritier :
GS39kamasufu:2791: “this awakening of one one not awake is highly dangerous says kauṭilya [30]. for a fresh object absorbs whatever it is smeared with [31]. similarly this prince,
GS39kamasufu:2793: understands as the teaching of the science whatever he is told [32].” (mahā-doṣam a:
GS39kamasufu:2794: buddha-bodhanam iti kauṭilyaḥ. navaṃ hi dravyaṃ yena yena yenārtha-jātenopadihyate tat tad ācūṣati. evam ayam nava-buddhir yad yad ucyate tat tac chāstropadeśam ivābhijānāti.)
